modName: Sir Hach - Knightly Slithzerikai and or Argonian Companion
summary: This mod adds the intrepid Sir Hach to Winterhold. Custom Voiced, Full Back-story, Spear.
descriptionHtml:
[i]This mod adds the intrepid Sir Hach to Winterhold. Custom Voiced, Full Back-story, Spear.[/i]


[youtube]lwVudod3bwI[/youtube]

[i]"True honor is not about doing the right thing, but doing the right thing when no one is watching." - Sir Hach[/i]

[b] Summary:[/b]

Sir Hach and his employer Trenton can both be found at the Jarls Longhouse in Winterhold.
Sir Hach is a 2-handed tank that has a unique tunic/gloves/spear/book that can easily take out a giant, and morality isn't a problem for him.
Currently, there are no new quests, but Hach has an interesting book you can read.



[b] Compatibility:[/b]

• Confirmed to be Compatible With :
- Amazing Follower Tweaks



[b] F.A.Q:[/b]

Q: Sir Hach and/or Trenton's voice(s) are low quality/sound like a radio, can you fix this?
A: Sir Hach's voice has been updated in version 1.02!
Since Trenton is a fairly minor character, I didn't update him, maybe later.

Q: Sir Hach's power level is not what I want it to be, how do I change this?
A: He's meant to be tough seasoned warrior in the vanilla game, if you use SkyRe, the reproccer should adjust his tunic and spear. I have not looked into compatibility with other overhauls.

Q: Sir Hach does not utter a battle cry in combat, for shame! Can this be changed?
A: Yes, bring up your console by pressing ~ (Key above Tab) and type:
[i] set SAM_SirHachBattleCry to 1[/i]
By default, it's at 0 to suit Hach's personality, but options are nice.

Q: Sir Hach is not at my side, he's either gotten stuck in an abyss or is off-duty, and I need his help. Is there a quick way I can get him back?
A: Yes, when you first unlock him as a companion, you gain a power called "Summon Sir Hach".

Q: Will there be updates in the future?
A: Most likely, perhaps a quest, and more added to 'Tales of Old'.

[b] Credits:[/b]

• Thynar for the boring parts.

• The Radiant Spear model was made by Solusphere, check out his work at: http://blackspherestudios.com/

• Sir Hach is voiced by DonutsStrongJaw.

• Trenton is voiced by Trenton.

• Inspired by Avernum, Eschalon, Lord of the Rings, League of Legends, Battle for Wesnoth and Game of Thrones!
